title: Revenue: Viewing Sales Performance Data
body:
Revenue: Viewing Sales Performance Data¶

Performance keeps a record of the revenue of a bank account or a customer.

  1. Click Sales to view sales performance

  2. Change time frame by clicking Last 30 Days, Last 60 Days, Year to Date, or Life to Date

  3. Hover over a data point to view revenue on a specific date

  4. View the amount of money or numbers under Total Revenue, Average Amount, and Transactions

  5. Click the dollar amount to the right of a row to view the payments to a bank account
